cab.content: Printed for the Cabinet. March 1947SECRET - Copy No.CP. (47) 8712*/t Marc/i, 1947CABINETGOVERNMENT PUBLICITYNote by the Prime minister in view of the prolongation of the Lord Presidents absence, the Presidentof the Board of Trade will take over the Chairmanship of the information services Committees while the Lord President is away. All Departments, andparticularly the Central Office of Information and the Staff of the lord presidents Office, should therefore note that the President of the Board of trade will be in general charge of publicity, particularly on the economic side, andwill be available to give decisions.C. R. A.10 Downing Street, S. W. 1.12th March, 1947.
